rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a vestibule that adheres to Vastu principles by having a clear pathway from the North-facing entrance.
An open-plan space for socializing and relaxation with ample natural light and good ventilation. It integrates an open-plan kitchen seamlessly, creating a modern living environment.
A minimalist design kitchen that is integrated into the living area for ease of communication and workflow. It features efficient storage and modern appliances.
The master bedroom provides a quiet retreat with ample natural light and good ventilation, ensuring privacy and comfort.
A comfortable secondary bedroom that maintains a minimalist aesthetic and ensures proper Vastu alignment.
A functional guest room with essential amenities while adhering to spatial efficiency guidelines.
Modern bathroom facilities designed for convenience and privacy, ensuring ease of access from each bedroom.
